favourite.article: Amen, praise the Lord.... This song makes me alive. Whatever I do, how busy I am, in my confused time, in facing my problem, He makes everything clear. Yes, Lord, there's no one like You.
This song is Wonderful, It expresses my hearts desire perfectly. Thank you.
I like you for you sing is very good. Thank you.
Amen!!! In the troublesome times that are coming, Oh Lord, we need You to be very close. There is no one like You. Our hearts hunger for You, living LORD. Yes.
